title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - FinOps 3.0: Cost Intelligence for the AI Era (AIM268)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - FinOps 3.0：AI时代的成本智能 (AIM268)
abstract: FinOps has evolved from visibility to optimization and now to action. As AI workloads introduce new cost complexities, organizations can no longer afford analysis paralysis or endless dashboards. It is time for FinOps 3.0: a shift where cost intelligence is embedded directly into engineering workflows, insights are contextual and role specific, and automation becomes a trusted ally rather than a leap of faith. This session explores how to apply lessons from Kubernetes cost management to today’s AI challenges and provides a practical roadmap to help teams innovate faster, smarter, and more sustainably in the cloud. This presentation is brought to you by DoiT, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: FinOps已从可见性发展到优化，现在进入了行动阶段。随着AI工作负载引入新的成本复杂性，组织再也无法承受分析瘫痪或无休止的仪表板。现在是FinOps 3.0的时候了：成本智能直接嵌入到工程工作流程中，洞察具有上下文相关性和角色特定性，自动化成为可信赖的盟友而非信仰的跳跃。本次会议探讨如何将Kubernetes成本管理的经验教训应用于当今的AI挑战，并提供实用路线图，帮助团队在云中更快、更智能、更可持续地创新。本演示由AWS合作伙伴DoiT为您呈现。
